title: Dekton Heavy Duty Tri-Extending Wash Brush | Long Reach Water Fed Brush for Cars, Boats, & More | Ergonomic Foam Grip | Soft Bristles Prevent Scratching | Telescopic Design Extends to 3 Metres
features: Versatile Cleaning for Multiple Applications: The Dekton Heavy Duty Tri-Extending Wash Brush is designed for all-purpose cleaning tasks. With its long reach and water-fed feature, this brush is ideal for washing cars, trucks, boats, caravans, mobile homes, and vans. Whether you're detailing your vehicle or cleaning hard-to-reach areas, this brush makes the job quick and easy.

Telescopic Design for Extended Reach: This wash brush extends to an impressive 3 metres, allowing you to clean high or hard-to-reach areas without the need for ladders or stools. The telescopic design provides adjustable length, giving you the flexibility to tackle different cleaning tasks from a comfortable standing position.

Ergonomic Comfort Foam Grip: The Dekton Heavy Duty Wash Brush is equipped with ergonomic comfort foam grips that provide a secure and comfortable hold during use. This design reduces hand fatigue, allowing you to clean for longer periods without discomfort. The foam grip ensures a non-slip experience, even when wet.

Soft Bristles for Scratch-Free Cleaning: Featuring soft bristles, this wash brush is designed to prevent scratching while effectively removing dirt and grime. The gentle bristles are safe for all surfaces, including delicate paint finishes, glass, and plastic, ensuring that your vehicles and equipment remain in pristine condition.

Convenient Water Flow & Replaceable Brush Head: The water flows seamlessly through the brush, providing a continuous supply for quick and efficient cleaning. This feature eliminates the need for buckets and ensures that you can rinse while you scrub, making the cleaning process more efficient.
description: The Dekton Heavy Duty Tri-Extending Wash Brush is your ultimate solution for versatile and effective cleaning. With its long reach and water-fed design, this brush is perfect for washing cars, trucks, boats, caravans, mobile homes, and vans. Extending to an impressive 3 metres, the telescopic feature allows you to clean high or hard-to-reach areas safely and efficiently without the need for ladders. Ergonomic foam grips provide comfort during use, reducing hand fatigue while ensuring a secure hold even when wet. The soft bristles are designed to prevent scratches on delicate surfaces, allowing for a worry-free cleaning experience. Water flows through the brush for quick and effective rinsing, eliminating the hassle of buckets. Plus, with a replaceable brush head, you can maintain the performance of your wash brush for years to come. Whether you’re detailing your vehicle or sprucing up outdoor furniture, the Dekton Heavy Duty Wash Brush is the perfect tool to achieve a sparkling finish.
